name: CODEDOOR
description: Step into the current world of CODEDOOR, where you find yourself in an abandoned area filled with scattered containers. Each container is secured with a unique code, generated anew each time you play. Your mission is to locate the container with the specific code you are given. Succeed, and you survive to move to the next level. This version of CODEDOOR is just the beginning of a larger, more intricate journey that's set to unfold.
